attributes.action: Make it law to keep cats indoors and  add cats to  1988 traffic road traffic law
attributes.additional_details: Because there isnt enough awareness to prevent future accidents
attributes.background: Add cats to the 1988 road act law and put a new law in place to keep cats indoors unless there is security safety measures in place

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by requiring cats to be indoors "unless there is security safety measures in place".

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make it an offence to hit a cat and drive off:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591698

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
